format.description: the output format, defaults to table (choices: csv, json, table, value, yaml)

ip_version.description: List address scopes of given IP version networks (4 or 6) (choices: 4, 6)

name.description: List only address scopes of given name in output

no_share.description: List address scopes not shared between projects

noindent.description: whether to disable indenting the JSON

project.description: List address scopes according to their project (name or ID)

project_domain.description: Domain the project belongs to (name or ID). This can be used in case collisions between project names exist.

project_id.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by id

project_name.description: Run the action under a different project, identified by name

share.description: List address scopes shared between projects
